page.title: 19ITV in the East Midlands
page.content:
ITV Central's news gathering operation in the East Midlands is based in Terry Lloyd House on an industrial estate in Chilwell, giving fast access to the M1 and A52. A dedicated team of reporters, camera crew and technicians bring live and filmed reports to "Central Tonight" viewers in Nottinghamshire, Leicestershire, Derbyshire and beyond. Central maintains its own local news website via the ITV website, and has journalists assigned to monitoring and updating its presence on Facebook and Twitter.
David Heathcote
